page.title: 15RECREATION - CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: The{Ashdown Forest Cricket Club}runs a Saturday and a Sunday team; playing its home matches on a small ground situated in a clearing in the forest. The{Isle of Thorns Bowls Club}uses a bowling green at the Isle of Thorns which forms part of Sussex University. During the summer a{Swimming Club}for children is operated at the Isle of Thorns which has its own outdoor unheated swimming pool.{Horse riding is allowed in Ashdown Forest by permit only but is suspended when the ground becomes waterlogged.{Country Dancing classes are run by one of the inhabi- tants. The major hobby of most people is{gardening,}with many gardens being beautifully kept to provide colour, vegetables for eating and flowers for cutting and internal decoration.
